definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: That realization was not just healthy. It was liberating.
sentences.chinese: 這些感悟不僅健康，更是一場解放。

sentences.english: Shenyun is the wonderful artistic world that the poets pursue and is also the poets' deep understanding and feelings about the world.

sentences.english: Deepen our understanding of humor and irony.
sentences.chinese: 增進對幽默和諷刺效果的感悟力。

sentences.english: The clean and elegant life style deduces the deep thought of life.
sentences.chinese: 清雅的生活方式，演繹對生命的深層感悟。

sentences.english: Since Kwanzaa is a time for learning as well as joy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲寬扎節是一個感悟和喜慶的時刻。

sentences.english: Is actually to marriage, so it was not feeling that a string of "enlightened" craftiness.
sentences.chinese: 其實是自己對婚姻沒感悟，所以才得出一串“謬悟”。

sentences.english: There is a image to life has a profound understanding and comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 有一種意象，感悟着生活原義中的心靈迴歸。

sentences.english: Refreshing, always the fragrance of the sentiment in the ink what.
sentences.chinese: 沁人心脾，總能在油墨的芬芳中感悟些什麼。

sentences.english: We should learn from yesterday, cherish today and hope for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該感悟過去，珍惜現在，憧憬未來。

sentences.english: This is a kind of original ecology sentiment over world and life.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種對生命和世界原生態的感悟。

sentences.english: The original is meditation really dialogue, is the inspiration of life.
sentences.chinese: 原來是靜思本真的對話，是啓迪的生命感悟。

sentences.english: With which we feel the universal tolerance and generosity.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們感悟到宇宙天地的寬容與豪邁。

sentences.english: The suppression of students' personality has stifled their understanding of the mother tongue as well as their literature gifts.
sentences.chinese: 長期的個性箝制，窒息了學生的母語感悟和文學才情。

sentences.english: Although many of the examples are obviously dated, their lessons are timeless.
sentences.chinese: 儘管很多往事已如過眼煙雲，但他們的感悟永恆。

sentences.english: We can then take that awareness into the rest of our lives.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以將這種感悟用到以後的生活中。

sentences.english: Read a page fruitful life perception about the personal growth.
sentences.chinese: 看一部寫滿豐盛人生感悟的手札。

definition: to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
a flash of realization/the truth in a flash/a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to comprehend (the nature of things etc)/to achieve enlightenment
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
to devote oneself to spiritual development (esp. Buddhism or Daoism)/to devote oneself to perfecting one's art or craft
